title: [COMPLETE] Network Maintenance - 06/03/2015, 4:30am AEDT
body:
Summoners,

We'll be performing some network maintenance tomorrow morning (Friday 6th March) at 4:30am AEDT.

It is a follow up from [some of the issues we experienced earlier today](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/XHGFrU9j-follow-up-on-connection-issues-5032015).  There may be disconnections from games in progress at that time as we make some changes. 

Please keep an eye on the [server status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce) for up to date information at the time.

Mindstar
